sub_title: Independent teacher of Dutch as a Foreign Language
summary:
I am an independent teacher of Dutch as a Foreign Language. After more than 10 years of experience in the field I now specialize in fast-paced online courses for expats. 

=> 3-month study program with weekly online classes, starting in January, April and September.
=> Participants are introduced to the basics of Dutch language and culture in a relatively short time, learning ready-to-use phrases for daily life, but also gaining some insight into the bigger patterns.
=> Clearly structured core program, combined with a variable part based on questions and input from the participants.
  ………………………………………………………

About me and my teaching:

Born and raised in Amsterdam, I studied Classical Languages in university, and was a Latin and Dutch grammar tutor to high school students for many years. While living in Italy in 2008, I was asked to teach Dutch to a group of Italians. Later back in the Netherlands, I continued teaching Dutch as a Foreign Language. In the meantime I also worked at a bookstore specialized in language study materials, and as a freelance musician playing in small groups.

For the next ten years I taught both individual classes and group lessons, at beginner as well as advanced levels. I worked for language schools, international companies, and also directly with students. In 2020 my child was born, and soon after, the coronavirus pandemic led to most work turning online. Since that moment I’ve been specializing in online teaching in general, and more specifically online group courses for English speaking expats. In my Introduction Course students are introduced to the basics of Dutch language and culture in a relatively short time, learning ready-to-use phrases for daily life, but also gaining some insight into the bigger patterns.

In my lessons, I make creative use of the different insights and techniques I acquired during my own education and work experience. In the background, I’m continuously working on new ideas and materials.
